Class InstanceSettings

  • java.lang.Object
    • uk.co.brightec.ratetheapp.InstanceSettings

  • public class InstanceSettings
extends java.lang.Object

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static InstanceSettings getInstanceSettings()
      Returns the InstanceSettings for the RateTheApp widget Note: If you are using the 'app:rateTheAppName' you need to provide the rateTheAppName you want the InstanceSettings of.
      static InstanceSettings getInstanceSettings(java.lang.String rateTheAppName)
      Returns the InstanceSettings for the RateTheApp widget Note: If you are using the 'app:rateTheAppName' you need to provide the rateTheAppName you want the InstanceSettings of.

      Get the rating on the given instance of RateTheApp

      Set the given instance of RateTheApp to hide permanently

      Reset the given instance of RateTheApp widget's rating and visibility.

      Save the rating on the given instance of RateTheApp
